# Inverse Gamma

> Inverse gamma distribution.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var invgamma = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dists/invgamma' );
```

#### invgamma

Inverse gamma distribution.

```javascript
var dist = invgamma;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
